title: folk_tales_The_Boy_Hunting_Locusts
text:
source: https://fairytalez.com/boy-hunting-locusts/.
nation: greek.
title: The Boy Hunting Locusts.
text: A boy was hunting for locusts. He had caught a goodly number, when he saw a Scorpion, and mistaking him for a locust, reached out his hand to take him. The Scorpion, showing his sting, said: “If you had but touched me, my friend, you would have lost me, and all your locusts too!”.
